childMdx.excerpt: Still a foolish scholar, still a naked man bare before the gaze, now gifted simplicity.   None of this matters: reality is nothing like a…
Herbal tea at the end of space and time: there is nothing sweeter than this seamlessness.   Say: we are two touched by One, told to be…
"Tell them: I might not be here tomorrow, but you met a  believer . There is only One."   And us two, stood still here, delighted.    You…
